entry.source: {F812}Starving Man\0{F87A,59}{F813,1,403221}Hand over that demon!{F801}That demon... belongs to us!{F801}{F802}If we don't catch the demons, we'll{F801}be the ones who end up dead!{F801}{F802}You don't get it, do you!? You don't{F801}understand what it's like to have a{F801}life of nothing but suffering!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Starving Man\0{F87A,59}{F813,1,403221}Hand over that demon!{F801}That demon... belongs to us!{F801}{F802}If we don't catch the demons, we'll{F801}be the ones who end up dead!{F801}{F802}You don't get it, do you!? You don't{F801}understand what it's like to have a{F801}life of nothing but suffering!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Starving Man\0{F87A,59}{F813,1,403213}No...{F801}Master actually lost...{F801}{F802}I-I give up...{F801}We've got nothing left.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Starving Man\0{F87A,59}{F813,1,403213}No...{F801}Master actually lost...{F801}{F802}I-I give up...{F801}We've got nothing left.{F801}
